meanings.definition: A small carnivorous marsupial native to Australia.
meanings.sent1: The dasyure hunts for food in the Australian bush.
meanings.sent2: I saw a dasyure while hiking in Australia.
meanings.sent3: The dasyure tried to sneak up on its prey but tripped over a rock.
meanings.sent4: The dasyure's sharp teeth gleamed in the moonlight as it pounced on its dinner.
meanings.sent5: The dasyure's fur was a mix of brown and gray, blending perfectly with the surroundings.

meanings.definition: Any member of the Dasyuridae family of marsupials.
meanings.sent1: The zoo had a special exhibit featuring the dasyure and its relatives.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of the dasyure to learn more about marsupials.
meanings.sent3: The dasyure family reunion was a lively event with lots of hopping and jumping.
meanings.sent4: In the family of dasyures, each member has a unique role to play.
meanings.sent5: The dasyure clan gathered together to celebrate a successful hunt.
